Ruby.en: Makes the foe repeat its last move over 2 to 6 turns.

Sapphire.en: Makes the foe repeat its last move over 2 to 6 turns.

Emerald.en: Makes the foe repeat its last move over 2 to 6 turns.

FireRed.en: Makes the foe use the move it last used repeatedly for two to six turns.
FireRed.de: Gegner wiederholt letzten Angriff 2 - 6 Runden lang.

LeafGreen.en: Makes the foe use the move it last used repeatedly for two to six turns.
LeafGreen.de: Gegner wiederholt letzten Angriff 2 - 6 Runden lang.

Diamond.en: The user compels the foe to keep using only the move it last used for two to six turns.
Diamond.de: Gegner wiederholt letzten Angriff zwei bis sechs Runden lang.

Pearl.en: The user compels the foe to keep using only the move it last used for two to six turns.
Pearl.de: Gegner wiederholt letzten Angriff zwei bis sechs Runden lang.

Platinum.en: The user compels the foe to keep using only the move it last used for three to seven turns.
Platinum.de: Gegner wiederholt letzte Attacke drei bis sieben Runden lang.

HeartGold.en: The user compels the foe to keep using only the move it last used for three to seven turns.
HeartGold.de: Gegner wiederholt letzte Attacke drei bis sieben Runden lang.

SoulSilver.en: The user compels the foe to keep using only the move it last used for three to seven turns.
SoulSilver.de: Gegner wiederholt letzte Attacke drei bis sieben Runden lang.

Black.en: The user compels the target to keep using only the move it last used for three turns.
Black.de: Das Ziel wiederholt letzte Attacke drei Runden lang.

White.en: The user compels the target to keep using only the move it last used for three turns.
White.de: Das Ziel wiederholt letzte Attacke drei Runden lang.

Black_2.en: The user compels the target to keep using only the move it last used for three turns.
Black_2.de: Das Ziel wiederholt letzte Attacke drei Runden lang.

White_2.en: The user compels the target to keep using only the move it last used for three turns.
White_2.de: Das Ziel wiederholt letzte Attacke drei Runden lang.

X.en: The user compels the target to keep using only the move it last used for three turns.
X.de: Das Ziel wiederholt die letzte Attacke drei Runden lang.

Y.en: The user compels the target to keep using only the move it last used for three turns.
Y.de: Das Ziel wiederholt die letzte Attacke drei Runden lang.

O.Ruby.en: The user compels the target to keep using only the move it last used for three turns.

A.Sapphire.en: The user compels the target to keep using only the move it last used for three turns.

Sun.en: The user compels the target to keep using the move it encored for three turns.
Sun.de: Das Ziel wiederholt die letzte Attacke drei Runden lang.

Moon.en: The user compels the target to keep using the move it encored for three turns.
Moon.de: Das Ziel wiederholt die letzte Attacke drei Runden lang.

Ultra_Sun.en: The user compels the target to keep using the move it encored for three turns.
Ultra_Sun.de: Das Ziel wiederholt die letzte Attacke drei Runden lang.

Ultra_Moon.en: The user compels the target to keep using the move it encored for three turns.
Ultra_Moon.de: Das Ziel wiederholt die letzte Attacke drei Runden lang.

Omega_Ruby.de: Das Ziel wiederholt die letzte Attacke drei Runden lang.

Alpha_Sapphire.de: Das Ziel wiederholt die letzte Attacke drei Runden lang.
